thread.title: Build Your Own Workshop Stool With a Secret Compartment That Happens to Fit a Beer
thread.title_full: Build Your Own Workshop Stool With a Secret Compartment That Happens to Fit a Beer

author: Thorin Klosowski
title: Build Your Own Workshop Stool With a Secret Compartment That Happens to Fit a Beer
text:
A small stool for your workshop is handy enough as it is, but over on YouTube, Patrick Soriano decided to add in a secret compartment that just so happens to perfectly fit a beer. Advertisement 
The actual stool itself is pretty easy to build because you don’t need to make many cuts and the bulk of it’s just glued together then sanded down. Once that’s all together, add a hinge, toss the wheels on, and give it a quick paint job. It’s not going to keep the beer cold, but it certainly keeps it hidden.
